newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Sierra Health Services.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Sierra Health Services.

text.p: --Dillon Read analyst James Lane said he downgraded Sierra Health Services Inc, to a neutral from a buy, and planned to revise 1997 earnings estimates, based on concerns over the company's merger with Physician Corp of America.
--Lane said the acquisition will be dilutive to his current 1997 earnings eatimate of $2.65 per share, and will make his pre-merger price target of $40 per share more difficult to achieve.

--He also noted that most of Physican Corp's business in Florida is with Medicaid patients, where per member revenue per month is in the low $90 range. "As such, the margin potentials in this business are likely below Sierra's current book of business," he said.
